title: Chartly Telemetry SystemMetrics (v1)
description: System-level telemetry emitted by Chartly services. The 'metrics' object SHOULD contain numeric values (gauges/counters), but the schema allows broader values to avoid breaking producers during early iterations.

ts.description: RFC3339 timestamp when the telemetry snapshot was produced.

service.description: Service name emitting telemetry (e.g., gateway, orchestrator, connector-hub).

tenant_id.description: Optional tenant scope identifier when metrics are tenant-specific.

metrics.description: Key/value metrics map. Values SHOULD be numbers; keys should be stable metric names.

tags.description: Optional tags (dimensions) for the telemetry snapshot.
